summary: Moore is a city in Cleveland County, Oklahoma and is part of the Oklahoma City Metropolitan Area.
full_text:
Moore is a city in Cleveland County, Oklahoma, United States, and is part of the Oklahoma City metropolitan area. The population was 55,081 at the 2010 census, making it the seventh largest city in the state of Oklahoma.
Located between Oklahoma City and Norman, the city has been the site of several devastating tornadoes, with those occurring in 1999 and 2013 receiving national attention.

title: Moore, Oklahoma
